text: George Roberts, D.D. was an English priest in the 17th century."Catalogue of the Lansdowne Manuscripts in the British Museum" p252: London; British Museum ; 1819 Roberts was born in Oxfordshire and educated at St John's College, Oxford.Alumni Oxonienses 1500-1714, Riader-Roissie He held livings at Shermanbury and Hambleden. Roberts was Archdeacon of Winchester from 1660 until his death in 1661. ==Notes== Category:1661 deaths Category:People from Oxfordshire (before 1974) Category:Archdeacons of Winchester (ancient) Category:Alumni of St John's College, Oxford
title: George Roberts (priest)
